content.rendered: [vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][services_small title=”Agile and DevOps” icon=”steadysets-icon-atom” dynamic_content_type=”content” dynamic_content_link=”/offerings/agile-software-development/”]Our practices include continuous integration; continuous deployment; through streamlined backlog grooming; sprint reviews; and user story workshops for requirements elaboration. Through the Scrum/ Kanban boards and iteration demos there is full transparency and visibility – no second guessing.[/services_small][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][services_small title=”Cyber Security” icon=”steadysets-icon-lock” dynamic_content_type=”content” dynamic_content_link=”/cyber-security/”]Our engineers and analysts are familiar with the RMF and can perform work at any step, including evaluating system characteristics, system designs, operational processes, controls, and operational trends. OSI has successfully delivered end-to-end Federal Information Security Management Act (FISMA) compliance and assurance services.[/services_small][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][services_small title=”Cloud Computing” icon=”steadysets-icon-cloud” dynamic_content_type=”content” dynamic_content_link=”/cloud-computing/”]From solution design to deployment architecture our team delivered an end-to-end, on demand, elastic platform with a leading cloud infrastructure partner[/services_small][/vc_column][/vc_row]
